Javel-ein

by Daniel Linssen

More information

Please note that Javel-ein was not designed as a web game. As a result, the web version of Javel-ein will very likely have serious sound and performance issues. If you have a Windows machine, I strongly recommend downloading the standalone executable. The executable does not require an installation.

I really hope you enjoy Javel-ein. Please let me know what you think using the links above!

If you like, you can follow me on twitter to get updates on this and all my other games.
